name: The Adventures of Kitty Jones
description:
Kitty Jones is a 3D Platformer inspired by the likes of Banjo-Kazooie, Spark the Electric Jester 2 and the Sonic Adventure games.

Run,Jump, Slide, Grapple and Swing your way through the demo stage available and have a blast!


---  What is the state of the Project?  ---

THIS IS JUST A PROTOTYPE. NOTHING SHOWN IN THIS DEMO IS REPRESENTITIVE OF WHAT THE GAME IS GOING TO BE. THIS DEMO LEVEL AND LAYOUT IS FOR DEMO PURPOSES ONLY AND WILL MOST LIKELY CHANGE IN LATER DEMOS. 

Anyways, I still hope you enjoy it and have a blast! 



---  Can I donate to you?  ---

Yes! Please consider donating a few dollars to me, it's the only way you can support me for my YouTube channel, Art, Games and all my other projects and hobbies.

---  Why can I only donate to you in such an outlandish manner?  ---

Because then you get a cool game for donating! You get something in return for donating, but if you don't wanna donate that's fine too.
